title: Equinix Is the Biggest Gainer in the Management Top 250
sub_head: The data-center operator’s overall score was driven by a big gain in its innovation score.
body:
Equinix Inc. posted the biggest gain in overall score of any company in the Management Top 250 ranking for 2021, followed by Capital One Financial Corp .
The Management Top 250 ranking, developed by the Drucker Institute, measures corporate effectiveness by examining performance in five categories: customer satisfaction, employee engagement and development, innovation, social responsibility and financial strength.
